definition: variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: Wooden coverings to parapets and window sills.
sentences.chinese: 对女儿墙及窗台进行木质罩面。

sentences.english: The inside is less than one meter high called the parapet, also known as Yu wall.
sentences.chinese: 而内侧不足一米高的则叫作女儿墙，也叫做宇墙。

sentences.english: In the construction of roof parapet around good standard should be the thickness of insulation and slope.
sentences.chinese: 在施工屋面女儿墙四周标好应作隔热层的厚度及坡度。

sentences.english: The basis of concealed lightning bar in the coping of daughter wall was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了在女儿墙顶暗敷防雷带的依据。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
floor/floor (ie. metal plate, concrete slab, wooden planking etc)
to plaster/to render (a wall)/(fig.) to bring shame on/also pr. [mo4 hui1]
interlocking wooden brackets between the top of a column and crossbeams used in traditional Chinese architecture
